imr.matrix

Class LinearSystemSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • imr.matrix.LinearSystemSolver

  • public final class LinearSystemSolver
extends java.lang.Object
    The LinearSystemSolver class defines methods to solve linear systems and make LU decomposition.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LinearSystemSolver.LU
      Inner class to store the LU decomposition.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LinearSystemSolver()
      Makes a new instance of a LinearSystemSolver object.
      LinearSystemSolver(Matrix m)
      Makes a new instance of a LinearSystemSolver object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      LinearSystemSolver.LU lu()
      Returns a LU decomposition of a nxn coeficient matrix set before.
      boolean set(Matrix m)
      Sets a nxn matrix and a LU decomposition is made.
      static Vector solve(Matrix m)
      Static method to solve a linear system with a mxn matrix passed as parameter where n = m+1.
      static Vector solve(Matrix m, Vector v)
      static method to solve a linear system passing a nxn coeficient matrix and a n coeficient vector as parameter.
      Vector solve(Vector v)
      Method to solve a system havind a nxn coeficient matrix set before.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • LinearSystemSolver

        public LinearSystemSolver()
        Makes a new instance of a LinearSystemSolver object. Note that using this constructor no matrix has been set yet.

      • LinearSystemSolver

        public LinearSystemSolver(Matrix m)
        Makes a new instance of a LinearSystemSolver object.
        Parameters:
        m - a nxn coeficient matrix. Using this constructor implies that a LU decomposition of the matrix passed as parameter is made.

    • Method Detail

      • set

        public boolean set(Matrix m)
        Sets a nxn matrix and a LU decomposition is made.
        Parameters:
        m - a nxn coeficient matrix.
        Returns:
        true if there was a success or false otherwise.

      • solve

        public Vector solve(Vector v)
        Method to solve a system havind a nxn coeficient matrix set before.
        Parameters:
        v - vector of n coeficients.
        Returns:
        a vector with the solution of the system.

        If the system cannot be solved, this method returns null.

      • lu

        public LinearSystemSolver.LU lu()
        Returns a LU decomposition of a nxn coeficient matrix set before.
        Returns:
        a LinearSystemSolver.LU object having the LU decomposition.

      • solve

        public static Vector solve(Matrix m)
        Static method to solve a linear system with a mxn matrix passed as parameter where n = m+1.
        Parameters:
        m - a mxn system matrix.
        Returns:
        a vector with the solution of the system. The matrix passed as parameter is the nxn coeficient matrix and the last column has the coeficient vector. So it is a mxn matrix where n = m+1.

        If the system cannot be solved, this method returns null.

      • solve

        public static Vector solve(Matrix m,
                           Vector v)
        static method to solve a linear system passing a nxn coeficient matrix and a n coeficient vector as parameter.
        Parameters:
        m - a nxn coeficient matrix.
        v - a n coeficient vector.
        Returns:
        a vector with the solution of the system. If the system cannot be solved, this method returns null.
